SA14n865:2: dānabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 1 ||
SA14n865:4: śīlabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 2 ||
SA14n865:6: kṣāntibalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 3 ||
SA14n865:8: vīryabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 4 ||
SA14n865:10: dhyānabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 5 ||
SA14n865:12: prajñabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 6 ||
